title: Slate Money: Food: Alternative Meat
description:
In this Slate Money mini-series, Felix Salmon talks to guests about the economics of food.
This week, Tad Friend joins to discuss the growing alternative meat industry, the plant-based crusade of Impossible Foods CEO Pat Brown and the significant environmental benefits of ditching the beef patty.

"Value Meal" by Tad Friend for The New Yorker

Email: slatemoney@slate.com

Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
